Properties.string: Charge up your club, then press Q or E to unleash your yeti breath!

Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local RunService = game:service('RunService') local DebrisService = game:GetService('Debris') local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local IsFreezing = Tool:WaitForChild('IsFreezing') IsFreezing.Value = false local RunAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('RunAnim') local NumHits = Tool:WaitForChild('NumHits') local CanBreath = Tool:WaitForChild('CanBreath')
local Anims = {'RightSlash', 'LeftSlash', 'OverHeadSwing'}
-- CONSTANTS -- local MAX_HITS_TO_FREEZE = 3 local SWING_RATE = 1.0 local BASE_DMG = 35 local SLASH_DMG = 35 local SWING_DMG = 35
local Damage = BASE_DMG
local SlashSound = Instance.new('Sound') SlashSound.SoundId = 'rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav' SlashSound.Parent = Handle SlashSound.Volume = 0.7
local UnsheathSound = Instance.new('Sound') UnsheathSound.SoundId = 'rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav' UnsheathSound.Parent = Handle UnsheathSound.Volume = 0.5
local function rndm() return (math.random() - 0.5) * 2 end
local function tagHumanoid(hitHumanoid, player) for i,v in ipairs(hitHumanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name == 'creator' then v:remove() end end local creator_tag = Instance.new('ObjectValue') creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = 'creator' creator_tag.Parent = hitHumanoid DebrisService:AddItem(creator_tag, 1) end
local function makeIcePart(hitLocationCFrame, sizeValue) local part = Instance.new('Part') part.Name = 'Effect' part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Pastel light blue') part.FormFactor = 'Custom' part.Size = Vector3.new(sizeValue * math.random(), sizeValue * math.random(), sizeValue * math.random()) part.Transparency = 0.3 part.Reflectance = 0.3 part.TopSurface = 'Smooth' part.BottomSurface = 'Smooth' part.CFrame = hitLocationCFrame * CFrame.new(rndm() * 5, rndm() * 8, rndm() * 5) part.Velocity = Vector3.new(rndm(), rndm(), rndm()) * 100 part.RotVelocity=Vector3.new(rndm(), rndm(), rndm()) * 10 DebrisService:AddItem(part, 3 + 7 * math.random()) part.Parent = game.Workspace end
local function setNumHits() NumHits.Value = NumHits.Value + 1 if NumHits.Value > MAX_HITS_TO_FREEZE then NumHits.Value = MAX_HITS_TO_FREEZE end if NumHits.Value == MAX_HITS_TO_FREEZE then CanBreath.Value = true end end
local IsDebounce = false local function blow(hit) if IsDebounce or Tool.Enabled then print('Debounce ' .. tostring(IsDebounce)) print('ToolEnabled ' .. tostring(Tool.Enabled)) return end IsDebounce = true if hit.Parent then print'hit.Parent is true' local attackingCharacter = Tool.Parent
if attackingCharacter then print'attacking char is true' local attackingPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(attackingCharacter) if attackingPlayer then print'attackin player is true' local attackingHumanoid = attackingCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local hitHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') print(hitHumanoid) if hitHumanoid and hitHumanoid.Health > 0 then print'hit hum is true' if attackingHumanoid and hitHumanoid ~= attackingHumanoid and attackingHumanoid.Health > 0 then local rightArm = attackingCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Arm') print'stuff is true' if rightArm then print'right arm is true' local joint = rightArm:FindFirstChild('RightGrip') if joint and (joint.Part0 == Handle or joint.Part1 == Handle) then print'joints are true' tagHumanoid(hitHumanoid, attackingPlayer) local hitTorso = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Torso') local isKill = false if hitTorso then print'hit torso is true' -- other player is frozen local iceWeld = hitTorso:FindFirstChild('IceWeld') if iceWeld then print'iceWeld is true' if iceWeld.Part1 then local sound = Handle:FindFirstChild('ShatterSound') if sound then sound:Stop() sound:Play() end for i = 1, 15 do makeIcePart(iceWeld.Part1.CFrame, 3) end iceWeld.Part1:remove() end hitTorso:BreakJoints() isKill = true end end for i = 1, 10 do makeIcePart(hit.CFrame, 0.5) end hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if not isKill then setNumHits() end wait(0.9) end end end end end end end IsDebounce = false end
Tool.Enabled = true local function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled and not Tool.IsFreezing.Value then Tool.Enabled = false local character = Tool.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if not humanoid then print('Humanoid not found') return end
SlashSound:Play() local newAnim = Anims[math.random(1, #Anims)] while newAnim == RunAnim.Value do newAnim = Anims[math.random(1, #Anims)] end
RunAnim.Value = newAnim if newAnim == 'OverHeadSwing' then Damage = SWING_DMG else Damage = SLASH_DMG end
wait(SWING_RATE) Damage = BASE_DMG Tool.Enabled = true end end
function onEquipped() UnsheathSound:Play() NumHits.Value = 0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
Handle.Touched:connect(blow)

-- Tool Variables -- local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local IsFreezing = Tool:WaitForChild('IsFreezing') local FreezeAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('FreezeAnim') local FreezeOtherScript = script:WaitForChild('FreezeOtherScript') local RestorePlayerScript = script:WaitForChild('RestorePlayerScript') local RunAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('RunAnim') local NumHits = Tool:WaitForChild('NumHits')
-- GUI Variables -- local YetiClubGui = Tool:WaitForChild('YetiClubGui') local BarFrame = YetiClubGui:WaitForChild('Bar') local FillFrame = BarFrame:WaitForChild('Fill') local ChargeText = BarFrame:WaitForChild('Charge')
-- Character Variables -- local Character = nil local PlayerMouse = nil
local OriginalGrip = Tool.Grip local CurrentGrip = OriginalGrip local DebrisService = game:GetService("Debris")
local IsToolEnabled = true local IsFreezing = false local IsBreathingIce = false
-- GUI Helper Functions -- local function ShowGui() local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer if player then local playerGui = player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui then FillFrame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(171 * 0.004, 22 * 0.004, 24 * 0.004) YetiClubGui.Parent = playerGui end end end
local function RemoveGui() YetiClubGui.Parent = Tool ChargeText.Text = '0%' end
local function updateGui() if NumHits then local p = NumHits.Value / 3 if p == 1 then FillFrame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(1 * 0.004, 185 * 0.004, 29 * 0.004) ChargeText.Text = 'Press Q or E!' else ChargeText.Text = string.format('%i', p * 100) .. '%' end FillFrame.Size = UDim2.new(p, 0, 0.8, 0) end end
NumHits.Changed:connect(function(val) if val == 0 then FillFrame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(171 * 0.004, 22 * 0.004, 24 * 0.004) end updateGui() end)
function swordUp() CurrentGrip = OriginalGrip end
function swordOut() CurrentGrip = OriginalGrip * CFrame.Angles(math.pi * 0.25, 0.4, 0) end
function Toolinsword(Toolintime) delay(0, function() local startToolin = tick() local endToolin = startToolin + Toolintime while tick() < endToolin do Tool.Grip = CurrentGrip * CFrame.Angles(math.pi * 2 * ((tick() - startToolin) / Toolintime), 0, 0) wait() end Tool.Grip = CurrentGrip end) end
local function createFrost(parent, riseVelocity, smokeSize) local part = Instance.new('Part') part.Name = 'Effect' part.CanCollide = false part.Transparency = 1 part.FormFactor = 'Custom' part.Size = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
local frost = Instance.new("Smoke") frost.Color = Color3.new(0.8, 0.8, 1) frost.Size = smokeSize frost.RiseVelocity = riseVelocity frost.Parent = part
local motor = Instance.new("Motor") motor.Part0 = parent motor.Part1 = part motor.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0) * CFrame.Angles((3 * math.pi) * 0.5, 0, 0) motor.Parent = part DebrisService:AddItem(part, 5) part.Parent = parent wait(0.2)
return part end
local function onBreathingIce(humanoid, torso, head) IsBreathingIce = true if NumHits then NumHits.Value = 0 end Tool.IsFreezing.Value = IsBreathingIce local previousWalkSpeed = humanoid.WalkSpeed humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.1 local freezeAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(FreezeAnim) freezeAnim:Play(nil, nil, 1.5) swordUp() Tool.Grip = CurrentGrip wait(0.25)
local sound = Handle:FindFirstChild("FreezeSound") if sound then sound:play() end
part = createFrost(head, 8, 0.5)
for i=1,8 do if part and part.Parent then local part2 = Instance.new("Part") part2.Name = "Effect" part2.Transparency = 1 part2.CanCollide = false part2.FormFactor = "Custom" part2.Position = part.Position part2.Shape = "Ball" part2.Size = Vector3.new(3, 3, 3) part2.Velocity = (torso.CFrame.lookVector * 40) + (Vector3.new((math.random() - 0.5) * 2, (math.random() - 0.5) * 2,(math.random() - 0.5) * 2) * 8)
local bodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") bodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, part2:GetMass() * 196.2, 0) bodyForce.Parent = part2
local freezeScript = FreezeOtherScript:Clone() freezeScript.Parent = part2 freezeScript.Disabled = false
local objectValue = Instance.new('ObjectValue') objectValue.Name = 'RestorePlayer' objectValue.Value = RestorePlayerScript objectValue.Parent = part2
local c = Instance.new("ObjectValue") c.Name = "creator" c.Value = game.Players.LocalPlayer c.Parent = part2 DebrisService:AddItem(part2, 1) part2.Parent = game.Workspace end wait(0.35) end
IsBreathingIce = false local canBreath = Tool:FindFirstChild('CanBreath') if canBreath then ChargeText.Text = '0%' canBreath.Value = false end Tool.IsFreezing.Value = IsBreathingIce humanoid.WalkSpeed = previousWalkSpeed
wait(0.4) if sound then sound:Stop() end
wait(0.1)
if part then part:remove() end end
local function onKeyDown(key) key = string.lower(key)
if key == 'q' or key =='e' then if Character then local humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local torso = Character:FindFirstChild('Torso') local head = Character:FindFirstChild('Head')
if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and torso and head then if not IsBreathingIce then local canBreath = Tool:FindFirstChild('CanBreath') if canBreath and canBreath.Value then onBreathingIce(humanoid, torso, head) end end end end end end
local function onEquipped(mouse) --local currentlast = lastequipped
if not mouse then print("Mouse not found") return end
PlayerMouse = mouse
-- change icon PlayerMouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' Character = Tool.Parent ShowGui() PlayerMouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end
local function onActivated() if not IsToolEnabled then return end
IsToolEnabled = false
if PlayerMouse then PlayerMouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png' wait(0.75) PlayerMouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' end
IsToolEnabled = true end
local function onUnequipped() RemoveGui() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
RunAnim.Changed:connect(function() if Character then local humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") local anim = Tool:FindFirstChild(RunAnim.Value) if anim and torso and humanoid then local theAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(anim) if theAnim and humanoid.Health > 0 then theAnim:Play() if RunAnim.Value == 'RightSlash' then Toolinsword(0.5) end if RunAnim.Value == 'OverHeadSwing' then wait(0.25) swordOut() Tool.Grip = CurrentGrip wait(0.5) swordUp() Tool.Grip = CurrentGrip elseif RunAnim.Value == 'OverHeadSwingFast' then wait(0.125) swordOut() Tool.Grip = CurrentGrip wait(0.25) swordUp() Tool.Grip = CurrentGrip end end end end end)

local Part = script.Parent local DebrisService = game:GetService('Debris') local Players = game:GetService('Players') local RestorePlayer = Part:WaitForChild('RestorePlayer') local RestorePlayerScript = RestorePlayer.Value:clone()
local IsPlayerFrozen = false
local function createFreezeEffect(c, torso, humanoid, hit) -- only freeze if they don't have an ice weld if c.Value and c.Value ~= nil and torso:FindFirstChild('IceWeld') == nil then local playerHit = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent) if playerHit then if playerHit == c.Value then return end end IsPlayerFrozen = true
local part = Instance.new('Part') part.Name = 'Effect' part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Pastel light blue') part.FormFactor = 'Custom' part.Size = Vector3.new(5, 8, 5) part.Transparency = 0.3 part.Reflectance = 0.3 part.CanCollide = false part.TopSurface = 'Smooth' part.BottomSurface = 'Smooth'
local cf = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi * 2 * math.random(), 0.5 * math.random()) part.CFrame = torso.CFrame * cf
local motor = Instance.new('Motor') motor.Name = 'IceWeld' motor.Part0 = torso motor.Part1 = part motor.C0 = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi * 2 * math.random(), 0.5 * math.random()) motor.Parent = torso
DebrisService:AddItem(part, 8) part.Parent = game.Workspace
humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 RestorePlayerScript.Parent = humanoid RestorePlayerScript.Disabled = false end end
Part.Touched:connect(function(hit) if IsPlayerFrozen then return end if hit and hit.Parent then local c = Part:FindFirstChild('creator') local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local torso = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Torso')
if c and humanoid and torso then local restorePlayerScript = humanoid:FindFirstChild('RestorePlayerScript') if not restorePlayerScript then createFreezeEffect(c, torso, humanoid, hit) end end end end)
wait(0.8) Part:remove()

local Humanoid = script.Parent wait(8) if Humanoid then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end
script:Destroy() script.Parent = nil
